img_above_text:
![Wukong Karma 18.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/9/94/Wukong_Karma_18.jpg)
They behave much in the same way as regular Ginsenglings do, moving slightly faster than the boss, which can help you lure them away from his attacks. Prioritize taking them out first so you don't get blindsided later, and try the Ashen Slumber transformation spell to detonate yourself near them, or use Spirit Attacks with wide reaches.
img_below_text:
Stick to staying in safe spots to keep using Thrust Stance out of the range of his roots, or Pillar Stance above him, and look for his many openings when he tumbles to the ground to press the attack, and he'll fall before long, granting you both the **Old Ginseng Guai Spirit** , Millenium Ginseng Seeds to give to Chen Loong, and the **Ginseng Cape** to wear.
![Wukong Karma 19.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/f7/Wukong_Karma_19.jpg)
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Karma 18.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/9/94/Wukong_Karma_18.jpg)
They behave much in the same way as regular Ginsenglings do, moving slightly faster than the boss, which can help you lure them away from his attacks. Prioritize taking them out first so you don't get blindsided later, and try the Ashen Slumber transformation spell to detonate yourself near them, or use Spirit Attacks with wide reaches."
        - Following Text: "Stick to staying in safe spots to keep using Thrust Stance out of the range of his roots, or Pillar Stance above him, and look for his many openings when he tumbles to the ground to press the attack, and he'll fall before long, granting you both the **Old Ginseng Guai Spirit** , Millenium Ginseng Seeds to give to Chen Loong, and the **Ginseng Cape** to wear.
![Wukong Karma 19.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/f7/Wukong_Karma_19.jpg)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the video game "Black Myth: Wukong," showing the player character engaged in combat with the boss "Old Ginseng Guai." The preceding text suggests strategies for dealing with the Ginsenglings that accompany the boss, while the following text provides tips for defeating the boss itself, emphasizing the use of Thrust Stance and Pillar Stance to exploit openings when the boss is vulnerable. Successfully defeating the boss rewards the player with the Old Ginseng Guai Spirit, Millenium Ginseng Seeds, and the Ginseng Cape.
